A

authenticate() - Method in class net.afiake.samsungtvcontrol.SamsungTVControl
Tries to authenticate with the television, has to be run every time when a new socket connection has been made, prior to sending key codes.
AuthenticationException - Exception in net.afiake.samsungtvcontrol
Thrown when the television denied access, we are not allowed to control the television.
AuthenticationException() - Constructor for exception net.afiake.samsungtvcontrol.AuthenticationException
